features: Contains three 16 ounce bottles of hello kids fluoride free natural watermelon flavor rinse
Hello naturally friendly kids natural watermelon fluoride free rinse is thoughtfully formulated with natural watermelon flavor, soothing aloe vera and high quality sweeteners
This fruity mouthwash rinses away particles brushing may miss, cleans and freshen, and tastes so delicious they'll rush to rinse
Hello kids fluoride free rinse contains no alcohol, no artificial sweeteners, no artificial flavors, no dyes and no SLS sulfates
Choose friendly; hello is vegan, never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified) and made in the USA; Rinse and greet freely
body.description: Say hello to naturally fresh antiseptic mouthwash. This mind-blowingly fresh mouthwash is thoughtfully formulated with menthol from farm grown peppermint, a well-known antiseptic that kills the germs that cause bad breath. Throw in xylitol, tea tree oil, and keep the alcohol out (no burning and stinging, yay), and you have a little swish of heaven. But buckle-up, there’s more goodness: hello antiseptic mouthwash with natural fresh mint is dye free, fluoride free, SLS free, paraben free, triclosan free, and gluten free. It also contains no artificial sweeteners and no artificial flavors. If that weren't enough magic for one bottle, hello is also vegan, cruelty free, never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified and PETA recognized). Choose friendly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: take a swish on the wild side. this fluoride free black rinse rocks activated charcoal from sustainable bamboo, a natural detoxifier that keeps breath next-level fresh. it also contains coconut oil, tea tree oil, and xylitol. so delish, they'll rush to rinse. finally, a kid’s fluoride free mouthwash they’ll seriously love to use. it tastes awesome, freshens breath, and rinses away stuff brushing might miss. no joke, it’s everyone’s swish come true. more rinsing, less wincing. make buds with your tastebuds and kick plaque, gingivitis, and bad breath to the curb. this super friendly formula features aloe vera to protect gums, coconut oil to moisturize, mint to freshen and natural sweeteners that rock.

we think it’s time personal care was, well, personal. relevant. beautiful. delicious. friendly. and as natural as we can make it. we’re on a mission to make the world a friendlier place, starting with your mouth. hello is naturally friendly oral care, created by an entrepreneurial bunch using thoughtful ingredients so delicious you’ll rush to brush. for reals. swish happy. say hello to a naturally friendly and healthy way to show your mouth some love. our delicious, effective, alcohol free mouthwashes help protect against gingivitis and rinse away the germs and nasty bits that brushing and good intentions may have missed. with high quality, thoughtful ingredients like aloe vera, coconut oil, and xylitol, these rinses are your swish come true. more rinsing, less wincing. make a swish and choose friendly. no alcohol, no artificial sweeteners, no artificial flavors, no dyes, and no SLS/sulfates. no brainer. hello is vegan, cruelty free, and never tested on animals. hello's mouthwash bottles are made from 25% per (post-consumer recycled), because hello cares about packaging too. best of all, our kids rinses are formulated without mint so kids can say goodbye to "spicy", and hello to natural flavors that'll make them smile wide.

reviews.reviewText: My son loves it doesn't have alcohol in it Hello is the only brand we use for our family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Has a salty undertaste?
reviews.reviewText: When originally buying the toothpaste version of this flavoring, I enjoyed the taste instead of mint (mint tastes spicy to me that's why I buy non-mint toothpastes/mouthwash). When I opened the package and looked at the bottle I accidentally bought it not knowing this didn't have fluoride (MY MISTAKE). Now when I actually bought and tasted this, it had a watermelon taste but under that flavor tasted like salt water! It wasn't like I drank seawater with a hint of watermelon, but it was like swishing saltwater to relieve a sore throat with some watermelon flavoring added. The aftertaste was better as there wasn't any hint of salt in it. I'm not sure why the taste is there, from reading the ingredients I would assume something like the aloe vera in it, but I didn't really go in depth researching the reasons why the direct taste would be salty. In short, The mouthwash's direct flavor had an under-taste of saltwater but was not in the aftertaste, will probably not buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a game changer to get this for my daughter she likes it better than the regular brands that contain all the bad things. Great purchase will definitely keep buying it for her.
